description: Form validation and user input checking patterns

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:if condition="{email} != '' AND {email} != null">
  <q:if condition="{validateEmail(email)} == true">
    Valid email
  <q:else/>
    Invalid email format
  </q:if>
<q:else/>
  Email required
</q:if>

<q:if condition="{len(password)} >= 8">
  <q:if condition="{hasSpecialChar(password)}">
    Strong password
  <q:else/>
    Add special characters
  </q:if>
<q:else/>
  Password too short
</q:if>

<q:if condition="{age} >= 13 AND {age} <= 120">
  Valid age
<q:else/>
  Invalid age
</q:if>
Fill all fields
